statements: SELECT * FROM stock_data;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE date='2022-01-10';
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_data WHERE stock_id=1001;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE close_price > 100.00;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE open_price < close_price;
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT date, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(high_price), MIN(low_price) FROM stock_data GROUP BY stock_symbol
SELECT AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM stock_data
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, price FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM historical_stock_prices;
SELECT market_index, sentiment_score, trading_volume FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM historical_stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, date, price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT max(price) as highest_price FROM historical_stock_prices
SELECT market_index, SUM(trading_volume) as total_volume FROM market_data GROUP BY market_index HAVING total_volume > 10000 ORDER BY total_volume DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT market_index, market_value, date FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT model_name, algorithm_used FROM ml_models WHERE algorithm_used = 'Random Forest';
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-30';
SELECT date, stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL' AND date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_index='S&P500' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_id, model_name, algorithm_used FROM ml_models WHERE algorithm_used='Random Forest' ORDER BY model_id ASC;
SELECT date, market_value, market_index FROM market_data WHERE market_index='NASDAQ' AND date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, high_price FROM stock_prices ORDER BY close_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, market_index, close_index FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_name, accuracy, description FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy > 80 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, stock_symbol, prediction_date, predicted_price FROM stock_predictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy < 70 OR accuracy > 90 ORDER BY accuracy;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND volume > 100000 ORDER BY open_price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT market_index, close_index FROM market_data WHERE volume > 50000 AND date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy >= 0.85 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, prediction_date, predicted_price FROM stock_predictions WHERE model_id = 1 AND predicted_price < 100 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE market_index LIKE '%S&P%';
SELECT * FROM trade_history ORDER BY trade_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE symbol='AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM historical_stock_prices GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(close_price) > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC

SELECT symbol, date, predicted_price, actual_price FROM stock_predictions JOIN historical_stock_prices ON stock_predictions.symbol = historical_stock_prices.symbol WHERE date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY actual_price DESC
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol, action, quantity, price FROM trade_history WHERE action='BUY' ORDER BY trade_date ASC
